title: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource
description: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource. Therefore, all the resources being looked up are only relative to the location of the FontRegistry class in the org.eclipse.jface.resource path. It can be remedied if FontRegistry took a client class (or class loader) as an additional parameter in the constructor.
